articles.title: Google's AI Updates Enable Advertisers to Create Lifestyle Imagery with Adult Models
articles.author: Bia Staff
articles.summary: Google Ads has introduced AI-generated images featuring adult people and faces within its advertising campaigns, using generative AI (GAI) to produce lifestyle imagery. These updates provide asset audience recommendations and enable asset testing. All AI-generated images will be tagged with SynthID to ensure transparency and the system has safeguards to prevent deepfakes and sexually explicit content.

articles.title: Montecito Celebrity Unveils Relaunched Brand Logo
articles.author: Daily Squib
articles.summary: A celebrity relaunched her lifestyle brand, "Ass Ever," and introduced its first product, a toilet brush designed to smell like ass. The product is intended for cleaning toilets after bowel movements, aligning with the brand's overall theme.

articles.title: Chrome and Google iPhone Apps Are Getting Circle-To-Search
articles.author: Arol Wright
articles.summary: Google is launching updates to Google Lens for iPhones. These updates introduce a screen search feature within the Chrome and Google apps, allowing users to select on-screen elements for visual searches. Additionally, Google Lens will now integrate AI Overviews within its results.

articles.title: Salesloft Recognized in G2's 2025 Best Software Awards for Best Software Companies and Best Sales Software Products
articles.author: Salesloft Inc.
articles.summary: Salesloft received recognition in G2's 2025 Best Software Awards. The company was honored as one of the Best Software Companies and for having Best Sales Software Products.

articles.title: Major revamp of popular Laois filling station launched
articles.author: Edana Flynn
articles.summary: Maxol has launched a major revamp of its service station in Ballylinan, Laois, featuring new Maxol branding, a dine-in area, a ROSA Coffee station, and a Maxol Deli. This launch is part of Maxol's €100m 2023-2027 investment strategy for growth.

articles.title: Syntheia Signs Maiden Enterprise Deal with Van-Fort Ontario
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syntheia Corp. has signed an agreement with Van-Fort Ontario to deploy its AI agent, AssistantNLP, for the Nunavut Help Desk initiative. AssistantNLP will handle inbound calls from government staff and stakeholders, providing a scalable communication solution for infrastructure projects. The deployment is billed on an elastic call volume basis.

articles.title: Makeup, Meet Skincare: This Lightweight Tinted Moisturizer Actively Improves Skin Tone and Texture
articles.author: Kaitlin Marks
articles.summary: A new tinted moisturizer is introduced, blending makeup and skincare. The lightweight formula provides buildable coverage for 16 hours, offers SPF protection, and comes in 16 shades. The product aims to protect against environmental aggressors, resulting in a softer, smoother, and brighter complexion.

articles.title: iPhone Finally Gets Google Circle to Search—but It's Still Limited
articles.author: Mahnoor Faisal
articles.summary: Google launched a new feature called "Search Screen with Google Lens" for iPhone users. This feature, similar to Circle to Search, allows users to highlight and search for anything on their screen within the Chrome and Google apps. The Chrome and Google app updates with Search Screen are rolling out worldwide this week.

articles.title: Meet the company building content management system for top brands such as Lego, Burberry, Walmart, Alaska Airlines, and ASICS
articles.author: Pankaj Doval
articles.summary: Contentstack launched 'Brand Kit', a new feature leveraging Generative AI. This tool captures the brand essence and context, enabling tailored content creation for customers like Golfbreaks, aligning with their specific language and style. Additionally, Contentstack acquired Lytics and will allow us to track the launched brand's website performance.

articles.title: Apple unveils iPhone 16e: A cheaper smartphone option with new features
articles.summary: Apple unveiled the iPhone 16e. The iPhone 16e is a cheaper smartphone option. The iPhone 16e comes with new features.

articles.title: Get a $20 Target gift card when you purchase this Ninja CREAMi
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Target is offering a $20 gift card with the purchase of the Ninja CREAMi Deluxe, which features 24-ounce extra-large tubs for 50% more ice cream than the original model. The Ninja CREAMi Deluxe also includes five new programs, such as Italian ice and frozen yogurt, and offers easy cleanup with dishwasher-safe parts.

articles.title: My Crochet Generator Just Yarnified The Entire World, And I'm Obsessed
articles.author: Aaron Hirsch
articles.summary: BuzzFeed Arcade has launched an AI-powered crochet generator, a new service that allows users to virtually crochet anything they desire. The AI tool transforms user inputs into crochet designs, offering a creative and accessible way to engage with the craft without physical supplies.

articles.title: This Dry Shampoo Is a Holy Grail for Knotless Braids Wearers
articles.author: Aiyana Ishmael
articles.summary: Not Your Mother's Clean Freak 3-in-1 Dry Shampoo is reviewed for its effectiveness in managing smell and build-up in braids. The spray version is recommended for braided hairstyles due to its ease of use and fresh powder scent, while users are advised to spray it from a distance to avoid a white cast. The product freshens up braids, making it a go-to for maintaining freshness.

articles.title: East Auckland's newest supermarket set to open
articles.author: Times Team
articles.summary: Pak'nSave Highland Park is opening a new supermarket featuring specialist departments like bakery, butchery, deli, produce, and seafood, along with multiple checkouts. Foodstuffs North Island developed the space and the new location offers approximately 7,000m2 of supermarket and retail space.

articles.title: Google Lens brings Circle to Search to iPhone… sort of
articles.summary: Google launched 'Search Screen with Google Lens' for iPhones within the Google and Chrome apps, offering similar functionality to Circle to Search. Also, Google announced AI Overviews will begin to appear 'more often' in Lens results.

articles.title: Vancouver brand Saltyface brings the beach to your bathroom
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: A local company offers products including a new Daily Moisturizer, indicating a product launch. The company also features items such as Tanning Water in its product lineup.

articles.title: Vancouver brand Saltyface brings the beach to your bathroom
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Saltyface, a Vancouver-based beauty brand, recently released its first skincare product, the 'Daily Moisturizer'. The company plans further product releases in the first half of the year based on community feedback.

articles.title: Vancouver brand Saltyface brings the beach to your bathroom
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Saltyface, a Vancouver-based beauty and skin care brand, offers a range of products including Tanning Water, Tanning Foam, and a new Daily Moisturizer. The company aims to capture the feeling of being at the beach and embracing natural beauty through its clean products.

articles.title: Best DIY clothes dyes for upcycling old garments at home
articles.author: Saskia Kemsley
articles.summary: Dylon Washing Machine Dye Pods offer a solution for revitalizing old clothing and textiles in 22 colors.  The product effectively dyes up to 600g (or 1.8kg of lighter fabrics) in a washing machine, consuming 60 liters of water per dyeing process. Using the pod requires pre-washing, running a 40°C cycle with the pod, followed by cycles with detergent to rinse dye residue and remove any residue.

articles.title: Scalp health? Yes, it's something you should be thinking about
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: LUS Brands offers a selection of scalp-care products. Its Healthy Scalp Serum features a low molecular weight hyaluronic acid to hydrate the scalp. The company also produces the Exfoliating Scalp Scrub, which uses volcanic minerals and charcoal to remove buildup.

articles.title: From clothes to gadgets and toiletries – how to save cash with super dupes of your favourite products
articles.author: Assistant Consumer Editor
articles.summary: Costa is introducing cups of tea in its vending machines located in shops and garages. Superdrug offers a discount on the Oral-B Pro1 electric toothbrush for its loyalty scheme members, reducing the price from £69.99 to £34.99. Asda offers ankle boots as a cheaper alternative to Ugg boots.

articles.title: From clothes to gadgets and toiletries – how to save cash with super dupes of your favourite products
articles.author: Lana Clements
articles.summary: Sainsbury's introduced Taste The Difference coffee-and-chocolate-chip hot cross buns. Costa is now offering cups of tea in its vending machines. Asda offers an alternative version of UGG ankle boots.

articles.title: The smartphone that won't stretch your pockets in more ways than one
articles.author: Carly Schnurr
articles.summary: The NanoPhone, a new mini smartphone, is introduced as a portable alternative to oversized smartphones. This credit card-sized phone features dual SIM support, 4G and WiFi connectivity for apps like WhatsApp and Instagram, and built-in 5MP rear and 2MP front cameras. It is priced at $99.97.

articles.title: LG SHOWCASES WIDE SELECTION OF LAUNDRY SOLUTIONS INCLUDING HEAT PUMP WASHER AND DRYER AT KBIS 2025
articles.author: LG Electronics USA
articles.summary: LG Electronics is introducing its state-of-the-art laundry solutions at the 2025 Kitchen and Bath Industry Show (KBIS). The new models utilize LG's inverter heat pump and AI technologies, offering enhanced efficiency and energy-saving features. This lineup is customized for the North American market.

articles.title: Reviews Call This Handheld Steam Cleaner 'A Game Changer For Deep Cleaning'. Nab One Today For Under $50.
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: A handheld steam cleaner is available for under $50 on Amazon with an on-page coupon.  It uses water and heat to clean effectively without harsh chemicals, making it an eco-friendly option for cleaning surfaces like grout, tiles, toilets, and even cars. Reviewers praise its effectiveness in removing mold, grime, and stains.

articles.title: ‘Mouthwashing,' the True Savior of the Games Industry, Is Finally Coming to Consoles
articles.author: Dwayne Jenkins
articles.summary: The indie game "Mouthwashing", which has received critical acclaim, is launching on Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X/S, and PlayStation 5 later this year. Pre-orders can be accessed via Fangamer. The game is currently available on Steam.

articles.title: How To Create A Six-Second Ad.
articles.author: Copyranter
articles.summary: Mom's Touch, a South Korean restaurant chain, utilizes six-second ads to promote their spicy wings and burgers. The ads focus on humor to capture attention. Speculative ads for Kit Kat, Clorox, and Heinz are also proposed.

articles.title: Google brings a 'Circle to Search'-like feature to iPhone users
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Google is launching a new update for its Chrome and Google Search apps on iOS. The update introduces a gesture-based search feature, allowing users to search content directly from their screen. This functionality mirrors Android's Circle to Search feature.

articles.title: Google Lens just got an upgrade on your iPhone. Here's how it works
articles.author: Alex Blake
articles.summary: Google is launching an updated Google Lens feature within the Chrome and Google apps on iOS, allowing users to quickly search using gestures to select on-screen items. The update simplifies the previous implementation by eliminating the need to save images or take screenshots before using Google Lens. Google is also leveraging AI to add new abilities to Lens, which is coming to English-language users in nations where AI Overviews are available.

articles.title: Google brings a ‘Circle to Search'-like feature to iPhone users
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new 'Search Screen with Google Lens' feature to Google Chrome and the Google Search app on iOS. This feature enables users to perform visual searches by drawing, highlighting, or tapping on their screen. Users can access this feature through the three-dot menu or, in the future, via a new Lens icon in the address bar to easily search for items or information within their current screen.

articles.title: Drew Barrymore, 49, swears by these comfy Adidas sneakers — save 50%
articles.summary: Adidas Nizza Platform Shoes are highlighted as a comfortable and versatile footwear option, endorsed by celebrities and supported by positive customer reviews citing comfort, arch support, and wide-foot friendliness. The shoes are noted for pairing well with various outfits and are currently on sale at a discounted price.

articles.title: Kylie Jenner unveils new powder foundation
articles.author: Bang Showbiz
articles.summary: Kylie Cosmetics is launching The Natural Blur Powder Foundation, a vegan formula designed to provide a hydrating and comfortable matte finish. The product aims to smooth pores, fine lines, and skin texture while controlling shine, and can be used alone as a foundation or as a finishing powder.

articles.title: Small business grows 15x — and gives back to Dallas and beyond — with help from Amazon
articles.author: Amazon
articles.summary: Simpleaf, an eco-friendly cleaning product company, is developing new products. Since launching on Amazon, Simpleaf has experienced significant growth and has expanded its product line while maintaining a commitment to sustainability and social responsibility. The company's commitment extends globally through collaborations that help provide better hygiene amenities.

articles.title: Aquant Introduces the Next Generation of Aquant AI for Service Professionals
articles.summary: Aquant has released a next-generation version of its AI platform, enhanced by Agentic AI. The new release introduces "Ask Aquant," providing immediate AI-powered guidance, and dynamically routes users to the right tools and information within a single interface. This update accelerates problem resolution, improves decision-making, and drives efficiency across service operations.

articles.title: Lidl Ireland fans rushing to buy new bargain buy that's perfect for cleaning garden patio and it costs just €89.99
articles.author: Emma Mooney
articles.summary: LIDL Ireland is offering a new 2400W Power Washer for €89.99, suitable for cleaning gardens and outdoor spaces. Additionally, they have introduced a Surface Cleaner for €24.99, designed for efficient and splash-free cleaning of exterior surfaces like patios and garage doors.

articles.title: Acai Bowl and Acai Soft Serve launched in PHL to elevate healthy indulgence
articles.author: Business Mirror
articles.summary: Acai Always, founded by Justin David and Errol Alegre, Jr., has launched its Acai Sorbet Bowls and Soft Serve in the Philippines. The brand aims to provide a healthy, nutrient-rich alternative to traditional frozen desserts, using antioxidant-rich açaí. Acai Always plans to expand across Metro Manila in the coming months.

articles.title: Tesco shoppers 'obsessed' with £4 cream that's 'just like' £36 high-end product
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Tesco is offering a budget-friendly alternative to Sol de Janeiro with the launch of Skin Saints Body Butter, priced at £4.50 for a 200ml tub. It comes in three scents and is enriched with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E. Tesco has also released matching body sprays in these fragrances.

articles.title: Sky confirms a new Glass TV is on the way - and it's coming soon
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Sky is set to launch Sky Glass Air later this year, a new, more affordable version of its Glass TV. This smarter TV will feature a Quantum Dot 4K display and will be available in 43", 55", and 65" sizes, with Carbon Grey, Cotton White, and Sea Green color options.

articles.title: Walmart has a motherlode of Dyson vacuum deals this week - 6 deals you can't miss
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: The Dyson Digital Slim Cordless Vacuum, designed for deep cleaning, offers up to 40 minutes of fade-free suction and advanced whole-machine filtration. This lightweight vacuum, equipped with Dyson's digital motor, weighs 4.2 pounds and includes multiple attachments for versatile cleaning.

articles.title: AI Chatbot
articles.summary: xAI, Elon Musk's artificial intelligence company, has launched Grok 3, a new chatbot designed to compete with ChatGPT. Grok 3 boasts significantly more computational power and incorporates self-correction mechanisms. It will initially be available to Premium+ subscribers of X.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Feb 19, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch of several new products. CeraVe introduces a 2-in-1 Anti-Dandruff Hydrating Shampoo and Conditioner; Nescafé launches Espresso Concentrate in Black and Sweet Vanilla variations; Dropps releases UltraWash Plus Dishwasher Detergent with a three-chamber design; eos unveils Vanilla Cashmere Body Oil; Häagen-Dazs presents Belgian Waffle Cones with various flavors; adidas launches Vibes Fragrance Collection; Dunkin' introduces Cold Foam Creamers in Extra Extra and Chocolate flavors; NIVEA MEN reveals Age Defense Instant Hydrating Face Serum; Lunchables launches Spicy Nachos Snack Kit; and Del Monte releases Mexican Style Street Corn.

articles.title: Vax cleaner for pet owners worth £170 now less than £100 dubbed 'best carpet cleaner I've owned'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Vax Dual Power Pet Advance Carpet Cleaner at a 42% discount, reducing the price from £169.99 to £99. The carpet cleaner includes features like a pre-treatment wand and dual rotating brush bars. Alternatives like the Vax Platinum Smart Wash Pet-Design Carpet Cleaner and the Vax Rapid Power Pro Upright Carpet Cleaner are also mentioned.

articles.title: The generative AI honeymoon is over: What leaders must do now
articles.author: Joe Depa
articles.summary: EY is investing heavily in synthetic data for AI model training, particularly in regulated sectors like healthcare and finance. They are also promoting their EY.ai unifying platform to help organizations deploy Responsible AI with confidence. This platform provides tools and resources for integrating trustworthy AI into various aspects of business operations.

articles.title: Pre-spring cleaning hacks
articles.author: The Curator Team
articles.summary: The article highlights several cleaning and organization products, including an Electric Spin Scrubber with multiple brush heads, Magic Pants Hangers for maximizing closet space, and Acrylic Desk Drawer Organizers. It also features the Q5 Max+ robot vacuum with a self-emptying dock, Good Juju Laundry Detergent Strips, Method All-Purpose Cleaner Spray, and the Saje Bathroom Cleaning Kit. Additionally, The Complete Book of Clean offers eco-friendly cleaning tips, and an Electric Lint Remover helps revive fabrics.

articles.title: Simple remodel tip: upgrade your bathroom shower head
articles.summary: SparkPod offers a high-pressure showerhead designed for low water pressure areas. Glacier Bay introduces rainfall showerheads for a spa-like experience at home. Waterpik presents an eco-friendly low-flow showerhead for water conservation.

articles.title: NYSE CONTENT ADVISORY: PRE-MARKET UPDATE FOR FEBRUARY 19TH + NIKE ANNOUNCES COLLABORATION WITH SKIMS
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Nike and Skims are launching a new brand for women called NikeSKIMS. This announcement was part of the NYSE pre-market update on February 19th.

articles.title: Amazon axes TikTok-style shopping feature after just three years
articles.author: Unzela Khan
articles.summary: Amazon discontinued its 'Inspire' feature, a TikTok-style product feed launched in 2022. As an alternative for consumers to get inspiration for products, Amazon is focusing on its AI-powered shopping assistant, Rufus, launched last year, which can answer customer questions on shopping needs, make recommendations and facilitate product discovery.

articles.title: Major Scientific Equipment Provider Launches HawkSearch to Enhance Product Discovery
articles.author: Thomas Windhausen
articles.summary: Bridgeline Digital, Inc. announced that a major scientific equipment provider has launched HawkSearch to enhance product discovery and site search. The scientific equipment provider deployed HawkSearch to deliver AI-powered search and personalized recommendations, improving relevancy across its catalog. Dynamic auto-complete, a feature of HawkSearch, suggests relevant products as users type into the search bar, streamlining the search process.

articles.title: Doogee Blade GT Ultra Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Doogee announced the Blade GT Ultra smartphone in the first quarter of 2025. The 5G-ready phone features a 6.72-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 7300 processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB storage, a 100MP + 2MP dual rear camera, and a 32MP front camera, powered by a 5500 mAh battery.

articles.title: Simple remodel tip: upgrade your bathroom shower head
articles.author: Jené Luciani Sena
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new showerhead products. SparkPod offers high-pressure and filtered showerheads. Glacier Bay features rainfall showerheads, while Briout provides handheld options. Kohler and AquaDance present dual showerhead systems. Manasota focuses on filtered showerheads, and Waterpik and Niagara Conservation offer eco-friendly low-flow models. Moxie introduces Bluetooth-enabled showerheads, Huuke features LED showerheads, CASAINC offers thermostatic showerheads, and Moen provides water-saving showerheads using fine mist technology, available at retailers like Amazon, Home Depot, Wayfair, and Lowe's.

articles.title: Simple remodel tip: upgrade your bathroom shower head
articles.author: Jené Luciani Sena
articles.summary: Several companies offer new showerhead products designed to enhance the bathroom experience. SparkPod offers high-pressure showerheads, while Glacier Bay provides rainfall showerheads. Briout features handheld showerheads, and Kohler presents dual showerhead systems. Other products mentioned include filtered showerheads from Manasota, eco-friendly options from Waterpik and Niagara Conservation, Bluetooth-enabled showerheads from Moxie, LED showerheads from Huuke, thermostatic showerheads from CASAINC, and water-saving showerheads from Moen.

articles.title: Introducing the Lowest Priced Custom Shirt—The ‘One Color Wonder'
articles.summary: Bolt Printing launched the 'One Color Wonder', a budget-friendly custom Gildan Heavyweight Tee starting at $3.97 with a single-color print design and no setup fees. This new product targets businesses, event organizers, schools, and nonprofits seeking affordable custom apparel solutions with fast turnaround times.

articles.title: Blockbuster offers on washing machines: Up to 42% off on top load and front load options from big brands
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Several brands like Samsung, LG, Haier, Bosch, Whirlpool, and IFB are offering discounts on various washing machine models. These include front-load, top-load, semi-automatic, and washer-dryer combinations, each designed with specific features such as energy-saving technology, fabric protection, and efficient cleaning. The promotions aim to provide consumers with budget-friendly and convenient laundry solutions.

articles.title: Amazon hair dryer that 'halves drying time' reduced from £70 to £30
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Happy Goo's hair dryer, sold on Amazon, is presented as a competitor to Dyson's model. Users report fast drying times and smooth results due to the ionisation function, with adjustable heat and fan settings. Some reviewers prefer it over Dyson, citing faster drying, although others find the noise level higher and nozzle less convenient.

articles.title: The Download: selling via AI, and Congress testing tech
articles.author: Charlotte Jee
articles.summary: HP is acquiring most of Humane's assets for $116 million. This acquisition involves the AI Pin, an AI-powered product from Humane.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland set to sell major ‘just in case' staple in middle aisle ALL Irish homes should have and it costs just €13
articles.author: Emma Mooney
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland is introducing a new fire extinguisher priced at €12.99, suitable for A, B, and C category fires, featuring a controlled discharge design and a five-year warranty. Additionally, ALDI Ireland is also launching a Laundry Storage Solution, offering stackable, narrow, and turntable container options for organizing laundry and other household items, each priced at €4.99.

articles.title: Aarke Coffee System Review: Shiny and Chrome
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: A new coffee maker and grinder has been launched, featuring an innovative 'autogrind' feature. This feature is uncommon in drip coffee makers.

articles.title: These 32 Products Are So Absurdly Good, They're Honestly In Their Own Tier
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: The content highlights various products available for purchase on Amazon, spanning categories such as skincare (Gold Bond firming neck and chest cream, Good Molecules eye gel, Eos body lotion), cleaning supplies (The Pink Stuff, WD-40 precision pen), and lifestyle items (Maldon sea salt flakes, Nippies pasties, L'Oreal glow-enhancing lotion). These items are presented with descriptions and positive user reviews to encourage consumers to explore and purchase these new or noteworthy products.

articles.title: Amazon offers on perfumes and deodorants: Up to 60% off; Let your fragrance do the talking
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: Amazon offers perfumes and deodorants for men and women at discounts up to 60%. The selection includes luxury and budget-friendly options with various fragrance notes and concentrations. The article highlights perfumes from Envy and Beardo.

articles.title: Dunelm's latest 'gorgeous' bedding that looks 'way more expensive'
articles.author: Samuel Jones
articles.summary: Dunelm is marketing their new Billie Duvet Cover and Pillowcase Set, featuring a pinsonic design and easy care, available in multiple sizes priced between £32 and £52. Debenhams is offering the Luxury Seersucker Duvet Cover Set Geo Pillowcase Quilt starting from £16.99. Marks and Spencer (M&S) provides the Egyptian Cotton 230 Thread Count Duvet Cover, ranging from £30 to £45.

articles.title: ⚡TVS Ronin 2025 Launched in India; Check Details
articles.summary: TVS launched the 2025 TVS Ronin in India. The launch includes details about the product's price, specifications, and features.

articles.title: Asda shoppers rush to buy 'retro' new Krispy Kreme treat that's the 'best ever'
articles.author: Jess Flaherty
articles.summary: Krispy Kreme has launched a new donut flavor in collaboration with Nestle Munchies. The new sweet treat featuring caramel kreme is available in Krispy Kreme shops, Asda supermarkets, and online for a limited time, until April 8, 2025.

articles.title: GoDaddy unveils GoDaddy Airo to revolutionise Africas SME sector
articles.author: Tech Moran
articles.summary: GoDaddy launched GoDaddy Airo, an AI-powered solution. This solution enables entrepreneurs to establish online presence. GoDaddy Airo helps bridge the gap between vision and digital reality.

articles.title: Huawei Mate XT battery life
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Huawei launched the Mate XT globally. This launch represents a notable event in the foldable smartphone market.

articles.title: I tried the ghd Rise Hot Brush that's all over TikTok
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: ghd's Rise Hot Brush is highlighted as a versatile hair styling tool capable of creating volume, curls, and straightening hair.  The tool features a 32mm barrel, heats up in 25 seconds, and has an automatic shut-off feature. Despite lacking a storage case and variable temperature settings, the ghd Rise Hot Brush is currently available on Amazon.

articles.title: Here are Amazon's #1 bestsellers this week
articles.author: Christina Marfice
articles.summary: Amazon features new product releases from various brands. Stanley introduces the Quencher ProTour Flip Straw Tumbler, while NYX presents the PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum. Apple launches the AirPods 4 Wireless Earbuds, and Amazon offers the Fire HD 8 tablet, along with the Fire TV Stick HD.

articles.title: Apple faces a new threat
articles.author: Kevin Williams
articles.summary: Huawei's Mate XT Ultimate, the world's only trifold phone, is now available outside of China, rolling out in Malaysia, Indonesia, the Philippines, UAE, Saudi Arabia, and Mexico. This phone features a 12MP ultrawide camera, a 12MP periscope telephoto lens with 5.5x optical zoom, and a 5,600mAh silicon-carbon battery. The phone boasts inward and outward folding capabilities and a 10.2-inch screen, priced over $3,660 internationally.

articles.title: Hyundai IONIQ 5 XRT Archives
articles.author: Scooter Doll
articles.summary: Hyundai has officially launched the off-road-friendly IONIQ 5 XRT variant in the US. This new variant features unique design upgrades and a new drive mode designed to tackle tougher terrain.

articles.title: Meet Xiaomi's new vacuum-mop
articles.author: DANIEL COHEN
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched the X20 Max robotic vacuum-mop, featuring advanced AI, powerful suction, and smart home integration. It offers features like automatic carpet detection, edge cleaning, and integration with the Mi Home app for voice control and smart cleaning task planning. The X20 Max is equipped with a 5200mAh battery, and can clean up to 200 square meters and supports Alexa and Google Assistant.

articles.title: POLL: Do you like the name of Meghan Markle's new brand?
articles.author: Lauren Welch
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's new lifestyle brand, 'As Ever,' is set to launch in Spring 2025. The brand represents a shift from her previous project, 'American Riviera Orchard,' with Meghan explaining the rationale behind the name change.

articles.title: From Everyday Brews To Elite Beans: Inside ZUS's Luxury Coffee Evolution
articles.author: Fernando Fong
articles.summary: ZUS Coffee has launched a new signature store in Taman Paramount, Petaling Jaya, offering an elevated coffee experience. They also have a second store located in The Oasis, Sunway Pyramid. New creations, such as 'Zeriously Matcha Latte' and 'Yuzu Thunder', are available alongside their beloved classics.

articles.title: Lumae Debuts with Science-Backed Innovation, Revolutionizing Skincare for Optimal Skin Health
articles.author: Rutuparna
articles.summary: Lumaè, a new skincare brand, launched with a focus on efficacy, sustainability, and inclusivity. The initial product line features an anti-ageing night cream with Astaxanthin and an anti-acne serum with Saffron, Ashwagandha, Salicylic & Glycolic Acid. Lumaè products are vegan, cruelty-free, and made in India, emphasizing transparency and sustainability.

articles.title: These 28 Products May Not Make You *Love* Cleaning, But They'll Make You Loathe It Less
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of cleaning products now available on Amazon. It covers everything from Bioclean Hard water stain remover, dust sponges for cleaning, air purifiers by Levoit, stainless steel cleaners, Bissell carpet cleaners, and Puracy's cleaning concentrates, offering solutions for various cleaning needs.

articles.title: 5 reasons you should use a Microsoft account on Windows 11, even if you don't want to
articles.author: João Carrasqueira
articles.summary: Microsoft emphasizes the benefits of using a Microsoft account on Windows 11, including syncing settings across devices, restoring purchased apps, and simplifying license activation after hardware upgrades.  Additionally, a Microsoft account is crucial for enabling device encryption with BitLocker and utilizing Phone Link for cross-device connectivity features like accessing phone photos and making calls from a PC.

articles.title: 2025 Hyundai Ioniq 5 XRT Photo Gallery
articles.author: Mark Vaughn
articles.summary: Hyundai introduced a new XRT trim level to its Ioniq 5 midsize crossover, targeting adventurers seeking electric vehicles. Testing in the desert outside Palm Springs proved promising for this off-road-ready model.

articles.title: MOVA Cleans Up The Competition With Two New Groundbreaking Smart Home Cleaning Appliances
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: MOVA is launching the MOVA Z50 Ultra robot vacuum and the MOVA X4 Pro wet and dry vacuum on March 2, 2025. The MOVA Z50 Ultra features 36℃ Thermostatic HydroSync™ Mopping Technology and Triple-Intelligence AI Sensing Tech. The MOVA X4 Pro uses SpotHeat™ Spray Cleaning with 80°C Hot Water Floor Cleaning and 100°C Deep Brush Washing.

articles.title: Beauty booking app lets you find last-minute treatments near YOU - here's how to get 10% off your next manicure or blowdry
articles.author: EMILY SCRIVENER
articles.summary: Treatwell, a beauty booking app, is offering 10% off for new customers using the code LPNEWBIE10 with a minimum spend of £25, expiring March 31 2025. The app provides convenient 24/7 access to book various beauty services like manicures, blow dries, and massages, eliminating the need to call salons.

articles.title: 'Lfe-changing' mattress topper saving £100s on a new mattress is under
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: MightySoft Mattress Topper is now available on Amazon starting at £29.99. The 10cm-thick topper boasts a quilted top layer and breathable microfibre filling. Ezysleep 4 Inch Thick Super Soft Mattress Topper is available at Robert Dyas for £32.99 and the 5cm Deep Memory Foam Mattress Topper is available at The Range starting at £52.99.

articles.title: 'GMA3' Deals & Steals on skin care and beauty
articles.author: GMA Team
articles.summary: Bliss offers skincare products for various concerns, including the Incredi-peel Glycolic Acid Pads and Drench & Quench Serum. Naples Soap provides clean, natural skincare products like the Florida Fresh Hand & Body Lotion and Sunkissed Body Butter. AHAVA features Dead Sea mineral-based products, including the Crystal Osmoter X6 Serum and Mineral Hand Cream. Epsom-It provides concentrated epsom salt lotions and bath bombs for muscle relief. PHYTO offers plant-based hair care products like the Purifying Cleansing Scrub Mask and NOURISHING Sublimating oil.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3a periscope lens
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Nothing, a London-based tech brand, is preparing to launch the Nothing Phone (3a) series on March 3rd. This represents the introduction of a new product line by the company.

articles.title: Dove's Satirical Ad Riffs on a Universally Hated Word: Moist
articles.author: T.L. Stanley
articles.summary: Dove launched a marketing campaign, created by Ryan Reynolds' Maximum Effort ad agency, to reintroduce its reformulated Deep Moisture Body Wash. The campaign features a satirical ad debuted during the SNL50: The Anniversary Special on NBC. This move is a departure for the brand, aiming for a lighter, cheekier approach to showcase the product's benefits.

articles.title: MOVA Cleans Up The Competition With Two New Groundbreaking Smart Home Cleaning Appliances
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: MOVA is launching the MOVA Z50 Ultra robot vacuum and the MOVA X4 Pro wet and dry vacuum on March 2, 2025. The Z50 Ultra features 36℃ Thermostatic HydroSync™ Mopping Technology and Triple-Intelligence AI Sensing Tech, while the X4 Pro includes SpotHeat™ Spray Cleaning with hot water floor cleaning and deep brush washing. Both products will be available on Shopee and Lazada at special launch prices.

articles.title: Your most important customer may be AI
articles.author: Scott J Mulligan
articles.summary: JellyFish's Share of Model software assesses how AI models view brands, like Ballantine's whisky, enabling companies to understand AI perception. Pernod Ricard created new ad campaigns for Ballantine's mass product based on AI analysis to counteract the premium image, highlighting the use of AI in product marketing.

articles.title: How to build your digital presence in 2025
articles.author: Kevin Jackson Observer
articles.summary: KeronRose is launching a four-hour live workshop called 'Building and Monetising Your Digital Presence in 2025' on Zoom. The workshop aims to provide a blueprint for building a brand that attracts, converts, and generates revenue online. It will be held on February 22nd and 23rd, and attendees can use the code 'observer' for a 30% discount.

articles.title: Elon Musk says, ‘Please report any issues in Grok3 AI chatbot'; Google CEO Sundar Pichai responds
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Elon Musk's AI company, xAI, has introduced Grok 3, the latest version of its chatbot designed to rival OpenAI's ChatGPT. Grok 3 is rolling out to Premium Plus subscribers on X and xAI is launching a separate subscription called Super Grok for dedicated fans who want the most advanced capabilities and earliest access to new features.

articles.title: 'I'm a laundry expert - everyone makes this mistake when drying bedding'
articles.author: Nicola Roy
articles.summary: Panda London, a bamboo bedding brand, advises against tumble drying bedsheets due to potential damage from excessive heat, leading to skin irritation and loss of softness. They recommend air-drying bedding on a washing line or airer, but not in direct sunlight, to preserve its texture and suggest washing bedding every one to two weeks, with spot cleaning for smaller stains.

articles.title: A Foldable Like No Other: The HUAWEI Mate XT Turns Sci-fi Into Reality
articles.summary: HUAWEI launched the Mate XT, the world's first triple-foldable smartphone. It features a 3K HUAWEI X-True™ Display offering three screen configurations: Single (6.4 inches), Dual (7.9 inches), and Triple (10.2 inches). The Mate XT also includes an ultra-aperture XMAGE camera with adjustable physical aperture and a large 5600mAh battery with HUAWEI SuperCharge capabilities.

articles.title: I got designer perfume at Superdrug for ‘free' with £8 hack
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: Superdrug has introduced "Perfume Pods" for £7.99, allowing customers to fill them once with designer perfumes available in-store. This enables customers to sample perfumes like Daisy by Marc Jacobs and Flash by Jimmy Choo at a lower cost, offering a convenient and affordable way to experience these fragrances.

articles.title: Elon Musk's xAI unveils Grok-3 AI chatbot, claiming it outperforms rivals
articles.author: system
articles.summary: xAI, Elon Musk's AI startup, has launched Grok-3, its latest large language model-based chatbot, to compete with companies like OpenAI and Google. Grok-3 is available to X Premium+ subscribers and through the new SuperGrok subscription tier, offering access via its mobile app and Grok.com website.

articles.title: Looking to identify and shop Canadian products? There's an app for that
articles.author: The Canadian Press
articles.summary: Sasha Ivanov is launching a new app called Maple Scan. Maple Scan helps shoppers identify Canadian products by analyzing photographs. The app provides details about where the products were made and whether they meet the government criteria for being labeled 'product of Canada' or 'made in Canada'.

articles.title: All you need to know about Zomato's AI customer support tool 'Nugget'
articles.author: DH Web Desk
articles.summary: Nugget has launched an AI-native, no-code customer support platform. This platform aims to help businesses scale their support with features like autonomous query resolution and seamless automation. It resolves up to 80% of queries autonomously.

articles.title: LGU+, 노브랜드 버거와 디지털 혁신·가맹점 상생 MOU
articles.summary: LG Uplus and No Brand Burger have partnered to introduce smart store solutions including internet, AI phones, and intelligent CCTV in No Brand Burger locations. The solutions are aimed at enhancing operational efficiency for franchisees, with LG Uplus providing communication services and No Brand Burger reducing investment costs and communication service fees. The partnership plans to expand Uplus communication services to new stores each year, starting with 200 locations this year.

articles.title: Huawei's Mate XT Ultimate Design to land on SA shores
articles.author: Faizel Patel
articles.summary: Huawei is launching its Mate XT Ultimate Design triple-fold device in South Africa, anticipated to boost the foldable smartphone market. The device, featuring a trifold display, debuted in Kuala Lumpur and is expected to be available in South Africa in April 2025. Alongside the smartphone, Huawei also unveiled the MatePad Pro 13.2' tablet, FreeArc buds and Band 10, which are all coming to South Africa.

articles.title: Xiaomi Pad 7's nano-texture display milestone counters conventional wisdom
articles.author: Vishal Mathur
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched the Xiaomi Pad 7 with a nano-texture display, priced at ₹32,999. The nano-texture display aims to reduce reflections and improve contrast, making it suitable for various use cases like work, entertainment, and reading. This new feature addresses the high cost typically associated with nano-texture technology, making it more accessible to consumers.

articles.title: ‘Omg run,' cry shoppers as they race to Tesco to nab incredibly cheap £245 Baccarat Rouge dupe
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Tesco has launched a new beauty range featuring affordable perfume dupes under the Skin Saints line, including a perfume resembling Baccarat Rouge. Additionally, Tesco offers dupes of Sol de Janeiro sprays, priced at £4.75, providing a cheaper alternative to the original brand.

articles.title: Leaked Galaxy Z Flip FE specs reveal 6.7-inch display, 50MP camera, and Exynos processor
articles.summary: Samsung is reportedly developing the Galaxy Z Flip FE, an affordable foldable device. Leaks suggest a design similar to the Galaxy Z Flip 6, with a 6.7-inch 120Hz display and a 50MP main camera. The device is powered by an Exynos chip and features an aluminum frame with Gorilla Glass Victus, potentially offering a more affordable alternative in the foldable market.

articles.title: Zomato Unveils Nugget; AI-Powered Customer Support Platform
articles.author: Sentinel Digital Desk
articles.summary: Zomato CEO Deepinder Goyal announced the launch of Nugget, an AI-based customer support platform designed for B2B software services. This no-code platform can autonomously handle up to 80% of customer queries and is the first product from Zomato Labs. Zomato is offering Nugget at no cost to companies with existing customer support contracts until those contracts expire.

articles.title: Can the Honor X9c handle your wildest adventures?
articles.author: Honor South Africa
articles.summary: Honor has introduced the Honor X9c, a durable AI smartphone designed for adventure seekers. It features drop, heat, and water resistance with an IP65M rating, and a 6600mAh battery lasting up to three days. The phone has also received a five-star comprehensive reliability certification from Switzerland's SGS.

articles.title: Nokia P1 Ultra Android 15
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Nokia has launched the Nokia P1 Ultra, a flagship smartphone.

articles.title: Nokia P1 Ultra Durability
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Nokia has launched the Nokia P1 Ultra, a flagship smartphone, marking its return to the high-end smartphone market.

articles.title: Nokia P1 Ultra Features
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Nokia launched the Nokia P1 Ultra, a flagship smartphone.

articles.title: Best Flagship Phone 2025
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Nokia is making a comeback with the Nokia P1 Ultra, a new flagship smartphone.

articles.title: Morzze Showcases Innovation at INTEXT EXPO 2025 with the Launch of MFD 1101 Food Waste Disposer
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Morzze launched the MFD 1101 Food Waste Disposer, featuring a BLDC motor, auto-reverse technology, sound insulation, and an eight-stage grinding system. This new addition aims to improve kitchen efficiency, sustainability, and convenience by effectively managing food waste and reducing landfill contributions.

articles.title: 25 years missing, Motorola enliven the Flagship Smartphone Market
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Moto G45 5G in Indonesia on February 18, 2025, a smartphone with advanced features at an accessible price point. The Moto G45 5G features an ultra-premium design with vegan leather, IP52 waterproof certification, innovative features, running on Android 15, powered by the Snapdragon 6s Gen3 processor, a 6.5-inch punch-hole display with a 120Hz refresh rate, and a 50MP Quad Pixel main camera. The Moto G45 5G, with 8GB of RAM + 256GB Storage, is priced at Rp 2,599,000, while the special Ramadan price is Rp 2,399,000.

articles.title: The Future of Housekeeping: How ShineOn is Disrupting the Cleaning Industry with AI and Innovation
articles.author: Our Reporter
articles.summary: ShineOn is introducing an AI-powered cleaning service that offers instant AI-driven scheduling, smart team assignments based on home size and cleaner skills, real-time cleaning updates with before & after photos, and AI-driven quality control based on customer feedback.  Future plans include smart sensors for automatic scheduling, predictive cleaning, and voice-controlled booking, aiming to transform the traditional housekeeping industry.

articles.title: Meghan Markle launches new lifestyle brand 'As Ever' on Instagram
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Meghan Markle launched her new lifestyle brand, 'As Ever,' on Instagram, rebranding from 'American Riviera Orchard'. The brand's official Instagram account debuted with a post teasing a Spring 2025 launch. Markle also revealed details about her brand and an upcoming show related to it.

articles.title: Meghan reveals launch date of her new brand and drops major hint about her plans
articles.author: Lauren Welch
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's new brand, As Ever, will launch in Spring 2025. The announcement was made via an Instagram post accompanied by a picture fitting the spring theme.

articles.title: LG Showcases Wide Selection of Laundry Solutions Including Heat Pump Washer and Dryer at KBIS 2025 (LG Corp)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: LG Electronics is showcasing its advanced laundry solutions. The company is also using its heat pump technology to strengthen its market position in North America.

articles.title: Zomato CEO Deepinder Goyal launches company's first AI platform 'Nugget'
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Zomato has launched Nugget, an AI-powered, no-code customer assistance platform designed for business-to-business software services. This platform, developed internally by Zomato Labs, handles up to 80% of customer inquiries automatically and offers features like image categorization, automated quality audits, and voice AI agents. Zomato is offering Nugget for free to companies with existing contracts to promote adoption.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series now in stores: Experience the future of AI at Aerophone
articles.author: CLOSE
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series, featuring advanced camera systems, enhanced battery life, AI-driven features, and a sleek design. Aerophone stores nationwide are offering exclusive promotions, including discounts on accessories and special deals for digital payment users. The Galaxy S25 series is also available in major Samsung retail stores and online through Aerophone, with options for installment plans and discounts on Samsung Care+.

articles.title: I got designer perfume from Superdrug for ‘free' with this £8 hack – tried it?
articles.author: Molly Court
articles.summary: Superdrug is offering a new product called "Perfume Pods" for £7.99, allowing customers to fill them once with designer perfumes like Daisy by Marc Jacobs and Flash by Jimmy Choo. This provides a more affordable way to experience designer fragrances without buying a full bottle, although limited by in-store availability and one-time refill at purchase.

articles.title: Finding AI Tools on the Microsoft Store Just Got a Lot Easier
articles.author: Simon Batt
articles.summary: Microsoft has revamped the AI Hub in the Microsoft Store to enhance the onboarding process for Copilot+ devices. The updated hub introduces features like Windows Studio Effects, Paint Cocreator, and Photos Image Creator. The AI Hub will update users on future developments, including new apps and built-in Windows tools such as Recall and Improved Windows Search, and is currently available in the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, and Australia.

articles.title: Best NSFW ChatGPT Alternatives: Unfiltered Adult Image Sites
articles.author: Levitated Media
articles.summary: Several NSFW AI chat platforms, including Candy.AI, GPT Girlfriend, Dittin, Apob, NSFW Characters, AI Char Friend, Privee AI, Fap AI, Muah AI, and Nastia AI, offer uncensored adult conversations and roleplay.  These platforms provide features such as customizable AI companions, AI-generated images, and secure messaging for enhanced user experiences. Each platform has unique strengths and limitations, including variable content restrictions, cost considerations, and privacy safeguards.

articles.title: Fone Haus launches Samsung S25
articles.author: Post-Courier
org: Young Port Moresby Chamber of Commerce and Industry
articles.summary: Fone Haus is hosting a launch event for the Samsung Galaxy S25 series on February 27, 2025, in Port Moresby. The Samsung Galaxy S25 series features cutting-edge AI and a new design. A brand-new Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra will be auctioned to support the Young Port Moresby Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

articles.title: HUAWEI nova 13 Launches in Singapore: Redefining Portrait Photography and Style
articles.author: Irone Kim
articles.summary: HUAWEI is launching the nova 13 smartphone in Singapore, available for pre-order on Lazada and Shopee starting February 18, 2025. The phone features a 60 MP Ultra-Wide Front Camera, Dynamic Plaid Texture Design, EMUI 14.2, and 100W HUAWEI SuperCharge Turbo. The HUAWEI nova 13 in Loden Green is priced at $598 and includes a FREE HUAWEI FreeBuds SE 2 for pre-orders.

articles.title: Luxury Jewelry Packaging Manufacturer Lussopack Brings Thai Expertise to US
articles.author: Lussopack
articles.summary: Lussopack is introducing new packaging solutions to the US luxury market. These solutions aim to blend tradition with innovation, meeting the needs of US brands. Lussopack's offerings include a one-stop service, offering design, sourcing and manufacturing, as well as sustainable packaging.

articles.title: AP Trending SummaryBrief at 8:26 p.m. EST
articles.summary: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, is launching a new lifestyle brand called As Ever. The brand's introduction constitutes the unveiling of a new product offering from the Duchess.

articles.title: Trust is at the core of our operations
articles.author: Daniel Obi
articles.summary: Kusnap Africa, an e-commerce platform, launched in 2020, connecting buyers and sellers with a focus on the African market. The platform differentiates itself through free listings, zero commissions, a user-friendly experience, and a focus on SMEs. Kusnap is also implementing AI assistance to enhance transactions and offer escrow services for secure payments.

articles.title: LG showcases wide selection of laundry solutions including heat pump washer and dryer at KBIS 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching new laundry solutions at KBIS 2025, including heat pump washers and dryers, the SIGNATURE laundry lineup, WashTower, and WashCombo. These products feature energy-efficient inverter heat pump technology, AI-powered features, ventless designs for easy installation, and remote control via the ThinQ app. The new laundry solutions deliver exceptional performance, efficiency, and convenience for users, contributing to LG's Zero Labor Home vision.

articles.title: Generative AI most desired new subscription service among 20s, 30s: poll
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: ChatGPT is a generative artificial intelligence application which has emerged as the most desired product in the new subscription application product category among consumers in their 20s.

articles.title: LG SHOWCASES WIDE SELECTION OF LAUNDRY SOLUTIONS INCLUDING HEAT PUMP WASHER AND DRYER AT KBIS 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LG Electronics is introducing its new laundry solutions at KBIS 2025, featuring heat pump washers and dryers. These solutions include advancements like ventless design, AI Direct Drive technology, and larger capacities, designed for enhanced efficiency and user convenience. The ThinQ app allows remote control, energy consumption tracking, and proactive issue alerts.

articles.title: Apps can now see when Android 16's high-security mode is enabled and react accordingly
articles.author: Dua Rashid
articles.summary: Google is developing a new "Advanced Protection Program" for Android 16, which acts as an added security layer. This program will feature an AdvancedProtectionManager API, allowing apps to automatically adjust their security settings when Advanced Protection is enabled. The functionality depends on apps adopting the API and Google releasing an update through Google Play Services.

articles.title: Meghan Markle Renames Her Lifestyle Brand As Ever
articles.author: New York Times
articles.summary: The Duchess of Sussex announced her brand's new name and its revamped focus in an Instagram video. The announcement precedes her upcoming Netflix series.

articles.title: Volvo previews facelifted 2026 XC60 enhancements
articles.author: Business Day
articles.summary: Volvo will introduce the XC60 premium SUV in 2026, featuring a refreshed user experience and enhanced comfort. The upgrades focus on delivering a more enjoyable and exclusive experience, with over-the-air updates.

articles.title: Nfinite to Unveil New Visual Experience Platform (VXP™) at eTail Palm Springs 2025 Showcasing the ...
articles.author: Rio Grande Sun
articles.summary: A company launched a new AI-driven solution. This solution upscales distressed product imagery to high-fidelity, immersive visuals at scale, thus it is a service related to images.

articles.title: Amazon has this 5000 amp NEXPOW car battery jump starter on sale for a whopping ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: NEXPOW is offering a deal on its Jump Starter product on Amazon, aiming to help customers avoid dead batteries during winter.

articles.title: The Nike X Skims line is expanding Kim Kardashian's business repertoire: Here's why you should ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Nike and SKIMS are launching a new brand called NikeSKIMS this spring. The brand is designed to sculpt and engineered to perform for the body obsessed.

articles.title: ‘We do not want to be inaccessible': Boult co-founder Varun Gupta on premiumisation and growth
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: A company launched a new line of smart audio products. The launch signifies the introduction of a new offering in the smart audio category.

articles.title: Banuba Launches a Virtual Try-On Plugin for Nuvemshop Transforming Online Shopping Experience on the Brazilian Market
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Banuba releases a plugin for Nuvemshop. The plugin simplifies the integration of Banuba's virtual try-on technology for Latin American online stores, thereby providing a new service for e-commerce businesses.

articles.title: Apple iPhone 16e Release Date Confirmed: Your Schedule For The Newest iPhone
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Apple is preparing to unveil a new iPhone model. The unveiling event is scheduled imminently.

articles.title: DeepSeek Heralds New Era Of Artificial Good-Enough Intelligence
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: A new 'ChatGPT rival' has emerged, combining quality with cost efficiency. This product is challenging competitors by offering a win-win situation for both developers and consumers.

articles.title: Lakme lipsticks for women: Coz there is a lipstick for every lady! Top 10 shades ...
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Lakme is a lipstick brand known for providing confidence and colour to women. Its lipsticks are designed to hydrate, plump, and enhance the appearance of lips.

articles.title: Genera is a Fashion Disruptor, Revolutionizing the Industry's Outdated Processes with Innovative AI Technology
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Genera, a company specializing in human and clothing digital replication, has officially launched. The company is using advanced AI to bring innovation, efficiency, and creativity in fashion.

articles.title: Nyxoah Announces Commercial Launch of Genio® Breakthrough Therapy in the Middle East
articles.author: Pharmiweb
articles.summary: Nyxoah has commercially launched its Genio® breakthrough therapy in the Middle East. This launch marks the availability of the Genio product in a new market.

articles.title: Huawei's tri-foldable phone hits global markets
articles.summary: Huawei launched its first tri-foldable phone, the Huawei Mate XT, globally in Kuala Lumpur. The phone, priced at $3,662, is the thinnest foldable phone at 0.14 inches and features a 10.2-inch screen.

articles.title: ब्रान्ड म्याक्स बासले ल्यायो वायरलेस इयर बड्स
articles.author: कान्तिपुर संवाददाता
articles.summary: The company claims that the new ear buds have 40dB active noise canceling, four microphones, and AI call noise canceling features. They also have a 13mm dynamic driver for clear sound and offer 6-7 hours of use on a single charge, with the charging case providing up to 48 hours of battery backup. The ear buds are priced at Rs 1,999 with a 6-month warranty.
